value:
$WmMPID_ファリナ,ch03_30_Farina_F_Normal,Face|My scouting mission was a success,
and I'm back to report in!$k$pBefore I get to the details, though,
I should tell you there's a huge
number of foes incoming.$k$pA much greater number than our
initial reports indicated!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Good work, Farina. Erk, would you
mind pulling out your map so we
can come up with a plan?$k$p$WmMPID_エルク,ch03_32_Elk_M_Normal,Face|Yes. Our current position is...right
around here, just west of the valley
where we set up camp.$k$p$WmMPID_パント,ch03_23_Pant_M_Normal,Face|And where were the bandits, Farina?
I imagine they were taking the route
along the river, yes?$k$p$WmMPID_ファリナ,ch03_30_Farina_F_Normal,Face|That's right. They were in this area
here, over here...ah, and in this forest
as well!$k$pLike I said, there are a lot of them.
Probably three times as many as
we expected.$k$p$WmMPID_ルイーズ,ch03_22_Luise_F_Normal,Face|If that's the case, our chances of
being surrounded are significant.$k$p$WmMPID_パント,ch03_23_Pant_M_Normal,Face|...I have an idea, if you don't mind,
Prince Alfonse.$k$pTogether, the power of Erk's and my
magic should be sufficient if we can
lead our foes into the proper position.$k$p$WmMPID_エルク,ch03_32_Elk_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_パント,ch03_23_Pant_M_Normal,Face|We will need to draw the enemy
to the ideal place using a decoy.$k$pThen we can approach from their
rear and quickly dispatch them with
a single concentrated assault.$k$pLouise, will you play the role
of decoy?$k$p$WmMPID_ルイーズ,ch03_22_Luise_F_Normal,Face|Of course. It would be my pleasure.$k$p$WmMPID_ファリナ,ch03_30_Farina_F_Normal,Face|Hang on. Wouldn't I be better suited
to be the decoy?$k$p$WmMPID_パント,ch03_23_Pant_M_Normal,Face|With you on the wing, the bandits
would be hard-pressed to give
chase, Farina.$k$pIf they aren't convinced they'll be
able to reach you, they won't chase
you in earnest.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|All right. Then let's move forward
with your plan, Lord Pent. Louise,
do be careful out there. Stay safe.$k$p$WmMPID_ルイーズ,ch03_22_Luise_F_Normal,Face|I will. You have nothing to worry
about. I will treat the situation
with utmost care.$k$p$WmMPID_ファリナ,ch03_30_Farina_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p
